code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JuminInput=props=>{const[birth,setBirth]=useState('');const[jumin,setJumin]=useState('');const[check,setCheck]=useState(false);const juminRegex=/\d{2}([0]\d|[1][0-2])([0][1-9]|[1-2]\d|[3][0-1])[-]*[1-4]\d{6}/g;const onChangeHandler=e=>{const{id}=e.target;const{value}=e.target;const onlyNumber=value.replace(/[^-0-9]/g,'');if(id==='birth'){setBirth(onlyNumber);}if(id==='jumin'){setJumin(onlyNumber);}};useEffect(()=>{let juminAll=birth+jumin;console.log(juminAll);if(juminRegex.test(juminAll)){setCheck(true);props.setInfo(prevState=>{return{...prevState,cJumin:juminAll};});}else{props.setInfo(prevState=>{return{...prevState,cJumin:''};});setCheck(false);}},[birth,jumin]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex w-full items-center justify-center pb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sub_title flex-col flex items-center",children:["\uC8FC\uBBFC\uBC88\uD638",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-[12px]",children:"(\uC678\uAD6D\uC778\uB4F1\uB85D\uBC88\uD638)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-col pl-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:'text',id:'birth',maxLength:6,value:birth,onChange:onChangeHandler,className:"input w-[100px] mr-2 input ",placeholder:"\uC55E\uC790\uB9AC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-bold text-[20px]",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:'password',maxLength:7,id:'jumin',value:jumin,onChange:onChangeHandler,className:"input w-[100px] ml-2",placeholder:"\uB4B7\uC790\uB9AC"})]}),!check&&jumin!==''&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-red-500 text-[11px] pt-2 pl-4",children:"\uC8FC\uBBFC\uBC88\uD638\uB97C \uD655\uC778\uD574\uC8FC\uC138\uC694."})]})]});};export default JuminInput;
